feed.title: Workout.cool Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout.cool: v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: missing db-generate script by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/44
  • chore: remove Plausible analytics integration and related imports to simplify the codebase feat(next.config.ts): add experimental turbo rules for SVG handling and configure webpack for better development experience by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/45
  • fix: only show unique options in set data additions by @realprogrammersusevim in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/46
  • style/chronometer down the screen by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/47
  • chore/prune deps by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/50
  • Fix: align ci with dockerfile by @adrienweidemann in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/51
  • chore/exercise selection perf by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/52

New Contributors

  • @adrienweidemann made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/51

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Workout.cool: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(workout-session): add auto-scroll functionality to current exercise and improve timer positioning for better user experience by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/57
  • feat(locales): add Spanish language support by including translations and updating locale handling by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/58
  • feat(locales): add Chinese language support by including translations and updating locale handling by @lulucatdev in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/61
  • chore/drag n drop performances by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/63
  • feat/detect locale by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/64
  • chore(auth): remove Facebook Pixel integration reliquat by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/65
  • refactor/muscle selection easier by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/67
  • feat: migrate from Resend to Nodemailer by @Norris1z in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/60
  • feat/add donation modal by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/68
  • feat/seo by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/69

New Contributors

  • @lulucatdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/61

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Workout.cool: v1.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(locales): add Russian language support by including translations and updating locale handling across the application by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/70
  • feat/add russia by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/71
  • fix: remove the leading / to prevent callback url from being //?signin=true by @Norris1z in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/72
  • feature: add workout_cool service to docker compose file by @Norris1z in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/49
  • feat(locales): add portuguese language by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/76
  • chore: remove remaining facebook pixel code by @Norris1z in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/77
  • chore: config issue templates by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/92
  • feat: add env to enable or disable OpenPanel by @Norris1z in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/78
  • Arrange project setup in a nicer fashion by @jelicicm in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/96
  • feat: display app version by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/98

New Contributors

  • @jelicicm made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/96

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for Workout.cool: v1.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: self hosting by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/103
  • chore/content translations by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/101
  • docs(self-host): mapping custom domain section by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/104
  • feat: check for sw updates by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/108
  • feat/open core model by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/114
  • fix: add missing trad in commons by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/115
  • feat/conversion flow by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/117
  • fix: correct some portuguese traductions by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/116
  • feat/tools by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/119
  • feat/roast-my-pricing-page by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/122
  • ci: publish images to ghcr by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/125
  • doc: update selfhosting and readme by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/124
  • Fix: Removes animate-pulse from calorie calculators by @michelegrace in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/123
  • refactor(calorie-calculator): refactor calorie calculator components and utilities for better organization and reusability by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/129
  • ci: skip notify discord for forked pr by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/128

New Contributors

  • @michelegrace made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/123

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/compare/v1.2.3...v1.2.4

entry.title: New release for Workout.cool: v1.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ci(ghcr-images): manual dispatch and no cache build by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/132
  • ci(ghcr-images): set image tag for manual dispatch by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/133
  • ci(ghcr): remove leading v from github release tags by @lucasnevespereira in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/134
  • feat/new programs card by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/135
  • feat/tools bmi calculator by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/136
  • feat/tools bmi calculator by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/137
  • Heart rate zone by @Snouzy in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/140
  • doc: Add links to translated README versions by @dowithless in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/142
  • Add Exercise Selection During Workout Creation (Step 3) by @Ojelaidi in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/102
  • Feat/favorite exercises by @silasburger in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/141

New Contributors

  • @dowithless made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/142
  • @Ojelaidi made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/102
  • @silasburger made their first contribution in https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/pull/141

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Snouzy/workout-cool/compare/v1.2.4...v1.3.0
